amethyst_imbuement.advancement.crystalli: Find an amethyst shard to begin your Amethyst Imbuement journey!
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.altar.des: Use the inquisitive gem you might've searched the wiki for to craft and use an altar of experience.
Surround an imbuing table with 30 bookshelves
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.arcane.de: Use a knowledge book to discover the secrets within.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.aspect_ge: Ignite a gem of promise into one of it's aspect gems.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.augmenter: Augment an item in the imbuing table.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.candlelit: Fully surround an altar of experience with candles.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.command_i: Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of Resonance.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.crying_ob: Obtain crying obsidian; used for crafting an imbuing table.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.devout_cl: Ignite a healers gem without eating food.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.dusty.des: Break down an extra magical item into gem dust.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.enhance.d: Enhance a gem in the crystal altar.
Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of the Equinox.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.flower_po: Collect a rose and lilac for enhancing basic crystals.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.grindston: Remove the maximum number of enchantments from one item with the disenchanting table.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.heal_insp: Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of Redemption.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.heart: If Only I Could Cover This In Gold...
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.heart.des: Obtain a heart of the sea.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.heart_cry: Imbue a crystalline heart from a golden heart.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.heart_gol: I CAN Cover This in Gold!
Craft a golden heart from a heart of the sea.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.hoarder.d: Completely fill an altar of experience
Craft a piece of imbued jewelry.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.master_re: Ignite an inquisitive gem with the hardest eight status effects.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_aegi: Upgrade a tier 2 wit scepter into the Aegis
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_equi: Upgrade a tier 2 fury scepter into the Equinox.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_fury: Upgrade an opaline scepter into a tier 1 fury scepter.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_grac: Upgrade an opaline scepter into a tier 1 grace scepter.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_leth: Upgrade a tier 2 fury scepter into Lethality.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_lust: Imbue a lustrous scepter, almost completely skipping an upgrade path.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_miss: Imbue an iridescent scepter instead of starting down an upgrade path.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_rede: Upgrade a tier 2 grace scepter into Redemption.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_reso: Upgrade a tier 2 wit scepter into Resonance.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.path_sojo: Upgrade a tier 2 wit scepter into the Sojourn.
Upgrade an opaline scepter into a tier 1 wit scepter.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.pillars.d: Surround a disenchanting table with all eight crystal pillars.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.protect_v: Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of the Aegis.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.scepter_o: Cast a spell with an opaline scepter
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.scroll.de: Imbue an empty spell scroll. Now to enhance it with some magic!
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.scroll_ma: Enhance an empty spell scroll with a spell, creating a magical spell scroll.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.slice_dis: Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of Lethality.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.trinketee: Add an augment to a piece of imbued jewelry.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.undying.d: Imbue a totem of amethyst with the undying augment
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.voyage_ho: Imbue a tier two scepter as you progress on the Path of the Sojourn.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.xp_bush.d: Imbue experience bush seeds to start growing experience bushes.
amethyst_imbuement.advancement.xp_bush_s: Obtain a full stack of bottles-o'-enchanting.
item.amethyst_imbuement.golden_heart.fla: You can hear it beating softly...
item.amethyst_imbuement.ametrine.flavor: You feel secure with it in your hand
item.amethyst_imbuement.crystalline_hear: Its faint heartbeat sounds like windchimes
item.amethyst_imbuement.brilliant_diamon: This diamond shines with an inner glow
item.amethyst_imbuement.copper_ring.flav: You feel lighter on your feet wearing it
Your steps feel longer wearing it
item.amethyst_imbuement.copper_amulet.fl: You feel energized with it around your neck
item.amethyst_imbuement.copper_ward.flav: It's faint glow protects you from harm
item.amethyst_imbuement.imbued_ring.flav: Its warmth makes you feel safe
Adds a beneficial attribute based on the specific item used in crafting.
It blankets you in a comforting glow
Adds a beneficial attribute based on the specific item used in crafting.
item.amethyst_imbuement.imbued_amulet.fl: It is a reassuring presence on your chest
Adds a beneficial attribute based on the specific item used in crafting.
item.amethyst_imbuement.imbued_ward.flav: It shines with a soft light that shields you from danger
item.amethyst_imbuement.spellcasters_foc: Glimpses of the bearer's soul can be seen in it's reflections
Modifiers on this focus augment spells cast by a scepter.
item.amethyst_imbuement.witches_orb.flav: The aspect gem sealed within shares its magic with the user
Grants a powerful scepter modifier to the holder based on the aspect gem used in crafting.
item.amethyst_imbuement.iridescent_orb.f: Thousands of truths echo across its surface
Millions of realities reflect in its depths
item.amethyst_imbuement.heartstone.flavo: It pulses gently in your hand
item.amethyst_imbuement.book_of_lore.fla: Hold a scepter in your offhand to increase chances of opening a spell relevant to that scepter
item.amethyst_imbuement.book_of_mythos.f: Hold a scepter in your offhand to increase chances of opening a spell relevant to that scepter
Welcome to $(o)Amethyst Imbuement$(), a mod all about the innate magic within crystals and other objects! Imbue your gear with powerful abilities. Create advanced weapons. Wield magical scepters to cast an array of offensive and defensive spells.$(br2)If you are new here, check out the $(l)$(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide)Starter Guide$() section
item.amethyst_imbuement.mana_potion.tool: Restore your scepter and other magical items
item.amethyst_imbuement.gem_of_promise.f: It sparkles with the promise of change
Interact with the environment to transform this gem. See the guide book for details.
item.amethyst_imbuement.sparking_gem.rec: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and get struck by lightning.
item.amethyst_imbuement.blazing_gem.reci: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and subject yourself to significant fire damage.
Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and gain several unique status effects. The status has to be gained while holding the gem (not pre-existing), and you don't need all 8 active at once.
item.amethyst_imbuement.lethal_gem.recip: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and kill a bunch of mobs.
item.amethyst_imbuement.healers_gem.reci: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and heal yourself a bunch. Eating counts.
item.amethyst_imbuement.brutal_gem.recip: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and take a bunch of damage from hostile mobs.
item.amethyst_imbuement.mystical_gem.rec: Hold a Gem of Promise in your off hand and cast a bunch of spells with a scepter or scroll.
item.amethyst_imbuement.glowing_fragment: It radiates magical energy. This could probably be used to upgrade a magical object...
item.amethyst_imbuement.accursed_figurin: A twisted symbol of malice. It's eyes pleadingly ask why? Why?
item.amethyst_imbuement.malachite_figuri: A treasured symbol of cooperation and peace between villages
item.amethyst_imbuement.resonant_rod.fla: It chimes beautifully when struck against a surface
item.amethyst_imbuement.knowledge_powder: This strange powder stores magical knowledge as effectively as any tome
item.amethyst_imbuement.charged_moonston: It feels out of place for some reason...
item.amethyst_imbuement.tigers_eye.flavo: It seems to watch over you
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.wasting.d: Damaged enemies are afflicted with slowness.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.deadly_sh: Increases crossbow and sniper bow range and damage.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.resilienc: Adds one armor point per piece per level.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.insight.d: Mobs drop additional experience when killed.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lifesteal: Heals the user when attacking an enemy.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.decayed.d: Withers the target temporarily on hit.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.contamina: Poisons the target temporarily on hit.
Axes deal additional damage and disable shields on hit.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.rain_of_t: On hit, arrow spawns additional arrows that radiate from the target.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.vein_mine: Mines multiple blocks in an area when a keybind is held.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.horde_mas: Buffs summons and pets while the totem is active.
Attackers have a chance of being cursed.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lightfoot: No longer sink in powdered snow or trample crops.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.bulwark.d: Heals the user when blocking an attack.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shielding: Adds 2% chance of blocking an attack per level. Stacks with jewelery.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.angelic.d: Enables creative flight while the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.crystalli: Increases weapon damage. Stacks with other damage enchantments.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.draconic_: Locate nearby ores with the vision of a dragon!
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.escape.de: Using the totem teleports the holder to the surface.
Endermen and piglins will not bother the wearer.
Summons a Crystalline Golem as aid when the holders health is low.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.hasting.d: Grants the holder Haste while the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.headhunte: Inflicts massive damage upon landing a headshot.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.illuminat: Grants the user Night Vision when scoped in.
The user is immune from negative status effects.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.inflammab: Grants Fire Resistance while the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.invisibil: Renders the wearer invisible, and the armor does not reduce that invisibility.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.moonlit.d: The user gains Strength and Resistance during the night.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.slimy.des: Protects from fall damage and bounces the wearer like a slime block.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soulbindi: Inventory is not lost upon death.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soul_of_t: Grants the holder Conduit Power while in water and the totem is active.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spectral_: Highlights nearby enemies with a spectral glow.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spiked.de: Damages the blocked attacker like Thorns.
Grants Strength while the totem is active.
Provides step assist, allowing movement up one block without jumping.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.suntouche: The user gains Strength and Speed during the day.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.undying.d: Totem acts like a Totem of Undying.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.magic_mis: A simple bolt of damaging energy.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.abundance: Range greatly increased, and there are two separate growth and harvest triggers per cast. Mana cost increased.
Bonemeals nearby crops and harvests when mature.
Spell range and AOE increased by 25%.
Explosions grow plants instead of starting fires.
Entities bonemeal the ground underneath them when they die.
Summons one floral construct instead of chickens. The construct gathers nearby mature crops.
Summons one floral construct instead of chickens. The construct will
Fangs erupt in circular waves around the caster instead of a straight line.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.animal_hu: Breeds, heals, and grows nearby livestock.
Spell range and area of effect increased 30%.
Damage against animals is massively increased.
Summons spawn with bonus max health.
Affected non-player entities are granted bonus max health.
The chicken magic of this spell is nurtured by Animal Husbandry.
Summons a beastly Draft Horse to carry you and your belongings.
Nearby animals temporarily follow you as if you are carrying food.
Amount of chickens spawned is massively increased.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.ball_ligh: Shock rate increased 35%, small chance to stun targets.
Launches a slow-moving ball of lightning that zaps nearby enemies as it passes them.
The barrier shocks enemies that hit you. Barrier strength and duration is increased.
Damaged enemies are fully stunned on crit, stunned enemies take increased damage, range is increased.
Fully stuns all nearby enemies. Cooldown is increased.
The song imbues its targets with lightning; their attacks chain to other nearby enemies and their attack speed is increased.
Spells deal damage as lightning as well as it's normal type(s).
Adds a 10% chance to stun the target.
Summoned entities temporarily shock nearby enemies.
Projectiles shock nearby enemies as they travel.
Affected players or mobs temporarily shock nearby enemies.
Explosions are slightly more powerful and have a chance to stun targets.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.barrier.d: Barrier duration increased massively. Amplification increased somewhat. Mana cost is increased.
Projectile or Effect removes some absorption from the target (before damage).
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.barrier.c: Grants the target fire resistance. No longer places lava.
Grants immunity instead of curing existing statuses. Duration increased.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.barrier.s: Kills with the soul missile have a chance to grant absorption.
Charms enemies to fight for you in place of stunning them. Mana Cost increased 25%.
Nearby enemies stop attacking and grants Hero of the Village.
Adds a %1$s chance to charm target(s).
Grants players Hero of the Village.
Summons draw aggro of nearby enemies.
Explosions have a chance to stun affected mobs.
The persuaded creature attracts the hostile intentions of all nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.body_swap: Range is greatly increased. Mana cost increased slightly.
The caster swaps places with the furthest targeted mob or player.
The caster teleports to the body of the target on kill.
Range and area of effect increased 25%.
Slash is teleported directly inside the furthest target, damaging it and other nearby enemies.
Nearby enemies are periodically teleported directly to the bearer of the curse.
Players have mobs teleported to them, mobs have nearby pets and summons teleported to them.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.chickenfo: Duration and effect amplifier are greatly increased.
Take on the aspect of a chicken, jump high, run fast, fall slow.
Also grants Jump Boost and Slow Falling.
Summon count, range, duration, and/or damage is increased.
Small chance hitting an enemy grants stacking speed.
Summons three beastly chicken... things to aid you in combat.
Bashes enemies and goes into berserk mode if one of it's brethren falls in battle.
Tosses the target or caster straight up at high velocity and grants Slow Falling.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.cleanse.d: Duration of immunity is greatly increased. Removes Cursed.
Removes negative statuses and grants temporary immunity.
Removes a random negative status effect from the target.
Removes a random positive status effect from the target.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.comet_sto: AoE and duration of the storm increased. Fireball explosion power increased. Mana cost increased.
Summons a storm of comets to rain destruction on an area.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.create_ha: Materializes a block of hard light a few meters out in the direction cast. Can place blocks in midair.
Deals additional damage to glowing targets.
Absorption strength is greatly increased. Mana cost and cooldown also increased.
Absorption strength is greatly increased. Mana cost and cooldown also increased.
Shroomlight is placed instead of Hard Light Block
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.create_la: Summons a Lava-infused hamster to fight alongside you. This hamster
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.cripple.d: Chance of critical strike much higher. Range of effect and number of possible targets increased. Mana Cost increased.
Damages, weakens, and slows nearby targets. Has a chance to critical strike, which stuns the target.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.curse.dou: Amplification and duration of the curse is greatly increased. Mana cost greatly increased.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.curse.des: Curses the target, increasing damage taken and reducing armor.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.dash.doub: Applies speed as well as dashing the player.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.dash.desc: Launches the user similarly to Riptide.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.debug.des: Instantly raises scepter level in all schools to 25.
Mines the targeted block, successfully mining higher and higher tier blocks as as the spell levels up.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.exhaust.d: Also applies Blindness and Mining Fatigue.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fang_barr: Summons several waves of evoker fangs.
Shoots 3 missiles instead of one, and the missiles echo.
Grants Strength, Water Breathing, and Dolphins Grace to all affected targets.
Each cast shoots multiple flame bolt projectiles.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fangs.dou: summons two rows of fangs instead of one.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fangs.des: Summons a row of evoker fangs.
Projectiles spawn a delayed fang under the targets feet.
Damage dealt pierces armor (not including enchantments).
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fangs.sum: Summons a totem that launches rows of fangs at enemies.
Totem has low health and armor, damage is increased.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fangs.for: Grants Haste, Water Breathing, and Dolphins Grace to the target or caster.
Explosion power greatly increased. Mana cost and cooldown increased.
Launches a fireball in the direction cast.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.flamebolt: Damage and duration of fire increased. Mana cost increased.
A fiery bolt of energy. Lights target on fire.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.flamewave: Each cast fires 3 projectiles instead of 1. Mana cost greatly increased.
A rapid-fire assault of flaming bolts. Lights targets on fire.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.flare.dou: Launches off a series of fireworks in succession.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.forcefiel: Size and duration of the forcefield is increased. Mana cost increased.
forcefield can be created in lava, displacing the lava and holding it at bay. Field duration increased.
Places a forcefield the user can pass through but harmful entities can't.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.fortify.d: Also grants Bone Armor. Durations are increased. Mana cost and cooldown increased.
Grants Strength and Resistance to the caster or target.
Bolt damage and duration of freezing effect increased.
A frosty bolt of energy that chills the target and nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.gusting.d: Range and power of the knockback increased.
Knocks back all enemies in a swath in front of the user.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.winters_g: AoE and duration of the freezing aura is greatly increased. Mana cost greatly increased.
Damages and slows nearby enemies over time, and randomly spawns snow
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.hampterti: Number of hamsters greatly increased, and higher chance hamsters spawn with equipment.
Summons a horde of hamsters to aid the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.hard_ligh: Range of the bridge greatly increased.
Summons a row of glassy blocks in front of the user.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.healing_w: Amount healed increased, and duration of the wind greatly increased. Mana cost and cooldown greatly increased.
Bathes the caster and nearby allies in a soothing wind that heals over time.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.ice_shard: Ice Shards pierce many more mobs per shot and explode into a cloud of frost on impact. Mana cost greatly increased.
Launches an icicle in the direction cast.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.ice_spike: Two rows of spikes are created instead of one.
Summons a row of icy fangs that damage and freeze on hit.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.inspiring: Provides short temporary damage immunity, and affected entities attacks have a chance to deal bonus damage.
Increases speed and jump height of the caster and nearby allies, regenerates slightly. At high levels applies a temporary death-resist.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.levitatin: Range, AoE, and duration of the bullets is greatly increased. Cooldown greatly increased.
Bombards nearby enemies with shulker bullets.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.lightning: Bolt damage is greatly increased. Cooldown and mana cost increased.
Strikes a nearby target with a lightning bolt.
Range and AoE of the storm is greatly increased.
Strikes all nearby enemies with a persistent storm of lightning.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.magnetic_: Range is increased, and also knocks nearby entities towards the caster. Mana cost increased.
Automatically picks up all nearby items continuously for a short period.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_clea: Duration of immunity is greatly increased. Removes Cursed.
Removes negative status effects from nearby players and grants temporary immunity.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_exha: Also applies Blindness and Mining Fatigue. Mana cost greatly increased.
Weakens and slows all nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_fort: Also grants Bone Armor. Durations are increased. Mana cost and cooldown increased.
Grants Strength and Resistance to nearby players.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_heal: Amount healed is increased, and spell cooldown is decreased. Mana cost increases.
Heals nearby players. More heal than minor heal.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mass_revi: Also grants Blessed. Amplification and duration of all effects increased. Mana cost greatly increased.
Regenerates, Heals, Cleanses, and grants Absorption to nearby players.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mend_equi: Amount repaired is greatly increased. Mana cost increased.
Repairs damaged equipment in the users inventory.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.mental_cl: Duration of the experience bonus is reduced, but the amplification of the effect is greatly increased.
Grants the target or caster increased experience gain.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.minor_hea: Amount healed is increased, and spell cooldown is decreased. Mana cost increases.
Heals caster or target. Amount healed increases with level.
The altered AI becomes permanent, persisting across game loads with no limited duration.
Persuades a nearby enemy to fight for you temporarily.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.poultrymo: Duration of the poultrymorph state is greatly increased.
Temporarily transmute the target into a harmless chicken.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.recall.de: Teleports the player to their respawn point.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.regenerat: Grants Regeneration. Duration increases with level.
Amplifier of Resonating is increased at twice the normal rate. Spell Cooldown is decreased.
Fires sonic pulses at nearby enemies, dealing increasing damage with each hit.
The affected target applies Resonating stacks and deal increasing damage based on stacks.
No longer applies Strength and applies less Resistance.
Stacks Resonating on all nearby enemies, and all friendly targets stack Resonating and deal increased damage.
Damage is increased by 1 with each stack of Resonating.
Dealing damage has a 50% chance to add 1 stack of Resonating to a target.
Spell effect amplification is increased 2 levels.
Summoned mobs have a chance to apply Resonating stacks when they deal damage.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shine.des: Targets or summons gain glowing temporarily.
Summons have a chance to inflict glowing when they hit their targets.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shine.exc: Highlights ores near the mined block with Draconic Sprites.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shine.sur: Highlights ores in a wide radius around the player with Draconic Sprites.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.shine.cre: White Crystallized Light is placed instead of Shine Light
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.smiting_b: Damage against undead greatly increased, deals AoE damage around the target, and damage to undead has a chance to stun.
Smites a nearby enemy with a holy blast. Deals extra damage to undead.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.soul_miss: Damage increased 20% and deals a small AoE burst of damage around the target.
A bolt of energy that pierces armor.
Skull explosion is more powerful and explosion damage bypasses all armor and enchantments.
Deals magic damage, bypassing physical armor.
Applies the Soul Shield effect in addition to the normal effects, granting magic resistance.
Affected enemies temporarily take increased magic damage.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.spectral_: Slash deals true damage, bypassing shields, armor, and enchantments.
An energy slash that damages all enemies in front of the caster.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_bo: Summoned Bonestorm attacks 20% faster and has substantially increased health. Mana cost increased.
Summons a Bonestorm to aid the caster in battle.
Explosions emit many damaging bone shards in random directions.
Summons spawn with bonus movement speed.
Affected targets gain the Bone Armor status effect, increasing their armor temporarily.
Summons a small army of Bones, skeletal zombies with a ranged attack
Shoots three ice shards in a spread out fan. Cooldown and effect amplifier are increased
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_ch: Summons chickens to aid the caster in battle ;).
Grants Slow Falling to the target(s).
Slain enemies have a chance to drop an egg.
Projectiles summon a chicken on hit.
Summons a majestic Chorse mount, or stores the existing Chorse in the scepter.
Chorses are fast, jump high, and have slow falling.
Temporarily grants an aura that pushes away all nearby mobs.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_fu: Totem attack speed and health is increased.
Summons a totem that periodically damages nearby enemies.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_go: Summons a Crystalline Goliath instead of a golem. Goliath has massive health, damage, and AoE attacks.
Summons a Crystalline Golem to aid the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_gr: Healing effect also grants Blessed, and effect range is greatly increased.
Summons a totem that periodically heals the summoner if in range.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_ha: Hamster spawns armored and equipped with a sword.
Summons a hamster to aide you in battle :3.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_se: Seahorse spawns with extra health, jump height, and speed.
Summons a Sea Horse mount or stores your mount in the scepter if it's currently summoned.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.summon_zo: Number of Zombies summoned is greatly increased.
Summons zombies to aid the caster in battle.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.survey.de: Creates a random explorer map of a nearby structure.
Opens a portal between the struck block and the player that lasts a minute and allows any allies to pass back and forth through.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.torrent_o: Launch a barrage of Boom Chicken eggs in the direction cast.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.weightles: Grants levitation and slow falling to the caster or target.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.withering: Damage is increased, explosion power increased, leaves behind a pool of withering energy.
The blow deals extra damage to all NON-undead, and applies Wither. Base damage and mana cost are also increased.
Comets are replaced with wither skulls.
Summons a wither skull and casts it at the enemy.
Killed enemies leave behind a cloud of withering energy.
Projectiles striking blocks cause a small magical explosion.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.zap.doubl: Range is increased, and shocks have a chance to stun targets.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.zap.desc: Zaps targets in a line with an electric shock.
Dealt damage has a chance to stun the target(s)
Summons shock a nearby enemy when the summon dies.
Range and area of effect increased 35%.
Effects amplified by an additional 2 levels.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.zap.summo: Summons a brutal Lightning Reaver in place of a golem.
The reaver moves incredibly quickly, blasting enemies it approaches with lightning attacks.
enchantment.amethyst_imbuement.zap.spect: Summons a brutal Lightning Reaver in place of a golem.
container.imbuing_table.level_low: Scepter level too low for this augment
container.imbuing_table.scepter_low: Scepter tier not high enough for this augment
container.disenchanting_table.tooltip2.b: Blank book or empty spell scroll required
container.altar_of_experience_tooltip_3: Hold Left Shift to toggle to fast transfer mode
container.altar_of_experience_tooltip_4: Release Left Shift to toggle off fast transfer mode
container.spellcasters_focus.hint: Which thread will weave your fate?
lore_book.screen.type_hint1: This spells school of magic as well as
lore_book.screen.type_hint2: the minimum level in that school the
lore_book.screen.type_hint3: scepter must have to be imbued.
lore_book.screen.type_hint4: (Cast spells of this type to level up your scepter)
lore_book.screen.mana_hint1: Durability used with each cast of the spell.
lore_book.screen.tier_hint1: Determines which scepters can accept it.
lore_book.screen.cast_xp_hint1: How much XP your scepter gains on a successful cast
emi.alert_slot.alert.desc1: The selected ingredient may alter the final output.
emi.alert_slot.alert.desc2: See the guide or ingredient tooltip for details.
augment_damage.check_can_use: Not enough durability to use augment!
augment_damage.guardian.check_can_use: Not enough durability to summon a guardian!
augment_damage.soul_of_the_conduit.burno: Soul of the Conduit augment burnt out!
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:furi: +1 fury XP and minor fury bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:enra: +2 fury XP and minor fury bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:witt: +1 wit XP and minor wit bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:geni: +2 wit XP and minor wit bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:grac: +1 grace XP and minor grace bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:eleg: +2 grace XP and minor grace bonuses
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:sain: Large negative impact on non-healer spells
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:pact: Large negative impact on non-fury spells
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:warr: Deals significant bonus damage to undead
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:cham: Shields affected entities and chance to grant resistance
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:sojo: Large bonus to spells that involve movement
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:trav: Bonus to spells that involve movement
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:sava: Adds one to all spell experience gained
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:disa: Chance to weaken struck or targeted enemies
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:test: Immense bonus to spell effect amplifier at the expense of longer cooldowns
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:spel: Massively reduces spell cooldowns but spells deal less damage and cost more
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:bolt: Big bonuses to bolt-type spells, and bolts have a chance to explode on impact
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:bols: Buffs the caster and nearby allies on successful spell cast
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:boun: Doubles spell range at the expense of longer cooldowns
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:fowl: Chance to summon a chicken on successful spell cast
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:inne: Increased spell effect amplification and duration
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:bles: Applies the Blessed status on successful cast
scepter.modifier.amethyst_imbuement:dyna: Reduces spell cooldown and mana cost
amethyst_imbuement.tip.scepters: There are 30 scepters in Amethyst Imbuement. Don't just craft a plain scepter; check out the upgrade tree!
amethyst_imbuement.tip.figurine: Malachite Figurines can only be obtained by trading with a Crystal Witch villager.
amethyst_imbuement.tip.augment: Some Amethyst Imbuement augments can be applied more than once to stack their effects.
amethyst_imbuement.tip.trident: Find a Trident? Upgrade it into a powerful Glistering Trident!
amethyst_imbuement.tip.warding_candle: Warding Candles ward off hoglins and piglins.
amethyst_imbuement.tip.gem_dust: A variety of magical items can be recycled into Gem Dust for imbuing into powerful new gems

Heroic

Max Level: IV

Increases crossbow and sniper bow range and damage.

Max Level: III

Adds one armor point per piece per level.

Mobs drop additional experience when killed.

readme.main_header.title: README - Amethyst Imbuement
readme.main_header.note: Note:  Previous versions of updated configs that have new version numbers (v1 from v0, for example) will be read and copied over to the new version, and the old version deleted.
readme.header.items.desc: The items config json tweaks the properties of scepters and other items. You may want to tweak it if you feel like scepters have too many uses at once, or conversely if you feel that they run out of mana too quickly, or if mana items run out of durability too quickly.
readme.items.giveGlisteringTome: [true/false] - When true, a glistering tome is provided to players on their first join into a world.
readme.items.manaItems_2: Options related to items that are powered by mana, and healed by mana potions.
readme.items.manaItems.imbuedJewelryDama: Integer between 30 and 0. Defines how much damage imbued jewelry takes on blocking a status. This number is multiplied by the amplifier of the status (+1).
readme.items.manaItems.fullManaColor: The color of the item mana bar at full durability. Will mix with emptyManaColor as the durability decreases.
readme.items.manaItems.emptyManaColor: The color of the item mana bar when depleted. Will mix with fullManaColor as the durability decreases.
readme.items.scepters_2: Misc options related to Scepters. For direct scepter settings, see the Materials config.
readme.items.scepters.uniqueWitherChance: Float between 1 and 0. Defines the chance that a unique AI item will drop from the wither upon death. In heavily modded environments this value should probably be *very* low, as many late-game players can kill dozens of Withers easily.
readme.items.gems_2: Configures the targets for the ignited gems of promise.
readme.items.gems.fireTarget: Integer between 1200 and 1. How many fire damage instances you need to ignite a Blazing Gem.
readme.items.gems.hitTarget: Integer between 600 and 1. How many times you need to be hit by mobs to ignite a Brutal Gem.
readme.items.gems.healTarget: Float between 1200.0 and 1.0. How much you need to regen in order to ignite a Healers Gem.
readme.items.gems.statusesTarget: Integer between 42 and 1. How many statuses you need to gain in order ignite an Inquisitive Gem. Capped at the number of statuses in MC and AI combined.
readme.items.gems.killTarget: Integer between 300 and 1. How many mobs you need to kill to ignite a Lethal Gem.
readme.items.gems.spellXpTarget: Integer between 3500 and 1. How much spell XP you need to gain to ignite a Mystical Gem.
readme.items.scroll.uses: Integer series; three values that increase A < B < C. How many spells each tier of spell scroll can cast before breaking.
readme.items.scroll.levels: Integer series; five values that increase A < B < C < D < E. What level the spell contained within is cast at. For example, [3] casts Flamebolt as Flamebolt III.
readme.header.altars.desc: This json defines functional tweaks for the altars, tables, and blocks in the mod.
readme.altars.hard_light_2: Configs related to the hard light blocks added by various spells.
readme.altars.hardLight.bridgeTemporary: If set true, the hard light blocks placed via Hard Light Bridge will be temporary based on temporaryDuration
readme.altars.hardLight.createTemporary: If set true, the hard light blocks placed via Create Hard Light will be temporary based on temporaryDuration
readme.altars.hardLight.temporaryDuratio: Int between 0 and 2,147,483,647, in ticks. Defines how long hard light blocks last if they are set as temporary above. If set to 0, the blocks will behave as if they are not temporary.
readme.altars.xp_bush_2: The chance an experience bush will grow to the next stage when fed bonemeal or randomly ticked by the world.
readme.altars.disenchant_2:: The level costs for using the disenchanting table, and how many disenchants you can get without pillars.
readme.altars.disenchanter.levelCosts: List of integers greater than 0. The table will iterate through this list from start to finish, and then if more disenchants are allowed (list is shorter than 5 long or baseDisenchantsAllowed has been increased) the last cost in the list will be repeated.
readme.altars.imbuing_2: Settings related to the imbuing table and optional integration options with various mods.
readme.altars.imbuing.difficultyModifier: Float from 10.0 to 0.0. Multiplies the level-cost of imbuing by the value entered. A value of 0.5 will halve the imbuing level costs, 2.0 will double them, and so on. 0.0 will make imbuing cost no experience.
readme.altars.imbuing_easy_2: The imbuing table can mimic certain behaviors from Easy magic. Settings for that are here.
readme.altars.imbuing_reroll_2: The imbuing table can mimic certain behaviors from Reroll. Settings for that are here.
readme.altars.altar_2: Settings related to the experience that can be stored in an Altar of Experience.
readme.altars.altar.customXpMethod: [true/false]. If set to false, Minecraft's default method for adding player XP will be used. When true, a custom method that bypasses this is used; this might help avoid undesirable interactions with mods that monitor XP gain. If these interactions are desirable, set to false.
readme.header.villages.desc: Settings to enable/disable various village structures, and their spawning weight.
readme.header.enchants.desc: Enables and Disables enchantments, and tweaks their maximum levels.
readme.enchants.disableIncreaseMaxLevels: If enabled, all tweaks to maximum levels will be ignored (default max levels will be used).
readme.enchants.enabledEnchants: Map of Amethyst Imbuement enchantments and whether they are enabled. Set an entry to false to disable. Do not remove or add entries, they will not have an effect and may reduce functionality.
readme.enchants.aiEnchantMaxLevels: Maximum levels for custom enchantments added by Amethyst Imbuement
readme.enchants.vanillaEnchantMaxLevels: Maximum level tweaks of vanilla enchantments. If there is an enchantment that isn't on this list, adding it will likely have no effect.
readme.trinkets.enableBurnout: true or false. If changed to false, trinket augments that burn out, such as Undying, won't do that. Instead they won't function until the mana is restored above a certain point.
readme.trinkets.draconicVisionRange: Integer from 16 to 1. The range of the draconic vision augment. A range of 4 will extend 4 blocks in every direction, so a cube with sides 8 blocks long centered on the player.
readme.trinkets.enabledAugments: Map of Amethyst Imbuement trinket and equipment augments and whether they are enabled. Set an entry to false to disable. Do not remove or add entries, they will not have an effect and may reduce functionality.
readme.header.entities.desc: Defines various base attributes of various mobs that are spawnable with AI.
readme.entities.forcePvpOnAllSpells: [true/false]. If true, all AI spells will enter PVP mode, regardless of the specific settings in the Augment configs.
readme.entities.crystalGolem.spellBaseLi: Integer that is >= 20 ticks. This is the lifespan used when a golem is summoned via Summon Crystalline Golem
readme.entities.crystalGolem.spellPerLvl: Integer between 5000 and 0 ticks. The amount that is added to the golem's base lifespan for each level of Summon Crystalline Golem.
readme.entities.crystalGolem.guardianLif: Integer that is >= 20 ticks. This is the lifespan used when a golem is summoned via the Guardian augment
readme.entities.cholem.enragedDamage: Double between 125 and 0. This damage is added to the Cholem's base damage when it becomes enraged.
readme.entities.cholem.enragedSpeed: Double between 1 and 0. This speed is added to the Cholem's base speed when it becomes enraged.
readme.entities.fleshGolem.zombieLifespa: Integer greater than 20. The lifespan in ticks of the unhallowed the flesh golem leaves behind when it dies.
readme.entities.hamster_2: Config Options for basic hamsters, including variants like Lampsters and Hamsicles.
readme.entities.hamster.baseLifespan: Integer between 180000 and -1. Defines the lifespan in ticks of a summoned hamster. If set to -1, the hamster will have infinite life.
readme.entities.hamster.baseDamage: Float between 10 and 0. Defines the damage hamsters summoned with Summon Hamster deal. For hamsters summoned via Hamptertime, change baseHamptertimeDamage.
readme.entities.hamethyst_2: The Hamethyst stats are controlled here, not in the hamster section.
readme.entities.hamethyst.baseLifespan: Integer between 360000 and -1. Defines the lifespan in ticks of a summoned hamethyst. If set to -1, the hamethyst will have infinite life.
readme.entities.hambie_2: The Hambie stats are controlled here, not in the hamster section.
readme.entities.bonestorm.baseLifespan: Integer greater than 20. Defines the base lifespan of a summoned Bonestorm Entity.
readme.entities.bonestorm.perLvlLifespan: Integer between 0 and 2400. Defines the additional lifespan of a Bonestorm per level of Summon Bonestorm.
